com.continuuity.weave.discovery
Interface DiscoveryServiceClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
InMemoryDiscoveryService, ZKDiscoveryService
public interface DiscoveryServiceClient

Interface for DiscoveryServiceClient to discover services registered with DiscoveryService.

Method Summary
 Iterable<Discoverable> discover(String name)
          Retrieves a list of Discoverable for the a service with the given name.
 

Method Detail

discover

Iterable<Discoverable> discover(String name)
Retrieves a list of Discoverable for the a service with the given name.

Parameters:
name - Name of the service
Returns:
A live Iterable that on each call to Iterable.iterator() returns an Iterator that reflects the latest set of available Discoverable services.
